code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{manageEquipment}from'../thunks/listEquipmentThunk';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Bydate=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const[isActive,setActive]=useState(false);const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[serverResponse,setServerResponse]=useState('');const[sortByLabel,setSortByLabel]=useState('Sort by...');const toggleClass=()=>{setActive(!isActive);};function sort(sortType){const obj={action:"sort",sortby:sortType};dispatch(manageEquipment(obj));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Bydate-container",onClick:toggleClass,children:[sortByLabel,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:isActive?'openNav':'closeNav',id:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item",onClick:()=>{sort('ASC');setSortByLabel("Newest to oldest");},children:"Newest to oldest"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item",onClick:()=>{sort('DESC');setSortByLabel("Oldest to newest");},children:"Oldest to newest"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item",onClick:()=>{sort('today');setSortByLabel("Today");},children:"Today"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-item",onClick:()=>{sort('NORMAL');setSortByLabel('Sort by...');},children:"Normal"})]})]});};export default Bydate;
